            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【一位在武汉德籍教师：有一件事情我无法想象】1月23日以来，我和我的家人，以及其他近900万人一同留守武汉。身处武汉，外界有很多问题等待着解答。这里的危机管理工作做得很好，一直深入到基层，使细节问题都能得到解决。有一件事情我无法想象：面对疫情，一些国家的媒体和政客正在释放种族主义情绪， ​​​​...<a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="uid=2286908003&amp;mid=4472200956021641&amp;pid=884f7263gy1gbwy7avz7kj20go0gogq7" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_fstt&amp;value=pop_butt_home" imagecard="pid=884f7263gy1gbwy7avz7kj20go0gogq7"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a><a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iuih9pgvf" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472200956021641:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472200956021641&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【男子<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A7%A3%E9%99%A4%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E5%90%8E%E9%AB%98%E5%85%B4%E8%B7%B3%E8%88%9E%23&amp;from=default">#解除隔离后高兴跳舞#</a>：我要去楼下跑几圈！】近日，江苏无锡滨河社区的张先生，在得知自己被解除居家医学观察后，高兴得当场跳舞，大喊“我要去楼下跑几圈！”前来登记的工作人员被逗乐。医生赶忙提醒：还是要记得少出门！分享快乐！网友：像极了坐完月子的我<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/a1/2018new_doge02_org.png" title="[doge]" alt="[doge]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">（央视）<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472198255269731:1034-video:1034%3A4471968775209027:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472198255269731:2286908003" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6htWQHD" alt="http://t.cn/A6htWQHD" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E6%8D%A3%E6%AF%81%E4%B8%80%E7%89%B9%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%B6%E5%94%AE%E5%81%87%E5%8A%A3%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E7%8A%AF%E7%BD%AA%E7%AA%9D%E7%82%B9%23&amp;from=default">#上海捣毁一特大制售假劣口罩犯罪窝点#</a>：查获10余万枚假劣口罩】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>上海市公安局通报，近日，上海市公安局经侦总队在工作中发现某网店涉嫌销售假劣口罩的犯罪线索，迅速会同松江分局开展缜密侦查，于2月14日下午联合市场监管部门成功侦破一起特大生产、销售假劣口罩案件，抓获犯罪嫌 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iui9jntLV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472196095595991:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472196095595991&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472193054851155" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iui4pkm0r?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-15 11:29" date="1581737376000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472193054851155:fromprofile"> 2月15日 11:29</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%85%E8%92%99%E5%8F%A4%E6%94%AF%E6%8F%B4%E9%A6%96%E6%89%B9%E7%89%9B%E7%BE%8A%E8%82%89%E6%8A%B5%E8%BE%BE%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#内蒙古支援首批牛羊肉抵达武汉#</a>】14日晚，满载52.1吨牛羊肉的货机载着草原人民的浓浓情谊，从呼和浩特起飞抵达武汉。预计一周内，呼和浩特白塔机场继续保障任务，将350余吨牛羊肉运抵武汉。据此前报道，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%85%E8%92%99%E5%8F%A4%E6%94%AF%E6%8F%B4%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%B9%B3%E8%82%89600%E5%90%A8%23&amp;from=default">#内蒙古支援湖北乳肉600吨#</a>，包括200吨羊肉、100吨牛肉、100吨猪肉和200吨牛奶。（湖北日报）                                            </div>
                                                                        <div class="WB_feed_expand">
                    <div class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg1_br"></i></div>
                    <div class="WB_expand S_bg1" node-type="feed_list_forwardContent">
                                                                            <div class="WB_info">
                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4470818904174414" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="人民网" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@人民网</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%85%E8%92%99%E5%8F%A4%E6%94%AF%E6%8F%B4%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%B9%B3%E8%82%89%E5%88%B6%E5%93%81600%E5%90%A8%23&amp;from=default">#内蒙古支援湖北乳肉制品600吨#</a>今日启运】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>11日下午，一件件牛奶在呼和浩特市集装上车。内蒙古支援湖北省乳制品和肉制品等生活必需品今日启运。此次支援的物资包括：200吨羊肉、100吨牛肉、100吨猪肉和200吨牛奶。内蒙古自治区商务厅厅长田永告诉记者，这批物资由内蒙古自治区分别 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4470818904174414:2286908003" href="/2286908003/ItIk2hvXg" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4470818904174414">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472191233636247" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iui1tffX9?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-15 11:22" date="1581736942000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472191233636247:fromprofile"> 2月15日 11:22</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【国家发改委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2380%E4%B8%87%E5%8F%AA%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%A8N95%E7%BA%A7%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E8%BF%90%E6%8A%B5%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%23&amp;from=default">#80万只医用N95级口罩运抵湖北#</a>】2月2日至13日18时，国家发展改革委共协调运抵湖北80万只医用N95级口罩，物流时间平均缩短21%，部分物资缩短50%以上。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>（国家发展改革委）<a title="国家发展改革委积极协调医用N95级口罩及时运..." href="http://t.cn/A6htdbBj" alt="http://t.cn/A6htdbBj" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>国家发展改革委积极协调医用N95级口罩及时运...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IuhWEv43a&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frenminwang&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609330604&amp;ssig=YSfgtTcp9T" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472188247403740" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuhWEv43a?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-15 11:10" date="1581736230000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472188247403740:fromprofile"> 2月15日 11:10</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E9%87%8D%E7%82%B9%E5%9C%B0%E5%8C%BA%E7%8E%B0%E9%87%91%E7%B4%AB%E5%A4%96%E7%BA%BF%E9%AB%98%E6%B8%A9%E6%B6%88%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#疫情防控重点地区现金紫外线高温消毒#</a>】国务院联防联控机制新闻发布会，人民银行副行长范一飞介绍：对疫情防控重点地区回笼现金，采取紫外线或高温消毒，通常存放14天以上再投放市场；对非疫情重点地区回笼现金消毒后，要求存放7天以上再投放市场。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472188247403740:1034-video:1034%3A4472188041101316:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472188247403740:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hV6UuU" alt="http://t.cn/A6hV6UuU" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472183160370939" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IuhOs1yuT?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-15 10:50" date="1581735017000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472183160370939:fromprofile"> 2月15日 10:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E8%A5%BF2%E5%90%8D%E5%BA%B7%E5%A4%8D%E8%80%85%E6%8D%90%E7%8C%AE%E8%A1%80%E6%B5%86%23&amp;from=default">#山西2名康复者捐献血浆#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> 昨天，山西一名新冠肺炎康复者，到太原市红十字血液中心自愿捐献血浆，用于临床危重症患者治疗。这名捐献者24岁，属轻症患者，已康复出院8天，血液中心在对其身体状况进行评估后，采集了580毫升血浆。目前，山西已有2名新冠肺炎康复者成功捐献血浆 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuhOs1yuT" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472183160370939:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472183160370939&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%88%E9%98%B3%E7%8E%B0%E6%AE%B5%E5%AD%90%E6%89%8B%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%92%E5%B0%8F%E5%93%A5%23&amp;from=default">#沈阳现段子手快递小哥#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E5%9C%A8%E5%A4%96%E4%BD%A0%E5%9C%A8%E9%87%8C%E6%88%91%E6%8B%BF%E5%B0%8F%E6%A3%8D%E9%80%92%E7%BB%99%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#我在外你在里我拿小棍递给你#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/22/2018new_erha_org.png" title="[二哈]" alt="[二哈]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】沈阳小区封闭，快递小哥：谁有快递，我搁这捏啊！我在外你在里，我拿小棍呢递给你。你再往前走两步，病毒瞅你都发怵！深居简出戴口罩，在家听话别胡闹！特殊期间互理解，花开疫散，咱们再拥抱！（人民日报）&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472179879906157:1034-video:1034%3A4472177362141221:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472179879906157:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hVcQnh" alt="http://t.cn/A6hVcQnh" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月15日 10:39</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%AE%E8%A1%8C%E5%90%91%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E8%B0%83%E6%8B%A8%E6%96%B0%E9%92%9E40%E4%BA%BF%E5%85%83%23&amp;from=default">#央行向武汉调拨新钞40亿元#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> 央行副行长范一飞介绍，央行采取多项措施切实保障现金使用安全：①人民银行积极向武汉调拨新钞40亿元，加大对医院等疫情防控关键单位的现金供应；②尽可能对外投放回笼发行基金；③做好流通中现金的消毒；④<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%93%B6%E8%A1%8C%E6%94%B6%E5%88%B0%E7%8E%B0%E9%87%91%E5%BF%85%E9%A1%BB%E6%B6%88%E6%AF%92%E6%89%8D%E8%83%BD%E6%8A%95%E6%94%BE%E5%AE%A2%E6%88%B7%23&amp;from=default">#银行收到现金必须消毒才能投放客户#</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IuhFJxjk8" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472177757939108:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472177757939108&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【正在直播：国务院联防联控机制新闻发布会】国务院联防联控机制于15日上午10时举行新闻发布会，请中国人民银行、中国银行保险监督管理委员会、中国证券监督管理委员会、国家外汇管理局负责人介绍金融系统全力支持抗击疫情和恢复生产有关情况，敬请关注。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472170980022293:1034-video:1034%3A4474030896381959:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472170980022293:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hV4wIO" alt="http://t.cn/A6hV4wIO" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【王贺胜：目前<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B7%B2%E6%B4%BE%E5%87%BA3%E6%94%AF%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E4%B8%AD%E5%8C%BB%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F2220%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#已派出3支国家中医医疗队2220人#</a>】王贺胜：在疫情初期，选派专家到武汉制定治疗方案，目前派出3支国家中医医疗队，达到2220人。坚持中西医结合，突出中医药的特色。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%B8%80%E5%8D%8A%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8A%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E4%B8%AD%E5%8C%BB%E8%8D%AF%E6%B2%BB%E7%96%97%23&amp;from=default">#湖北一半以上确诊病例使用中医药治疗#</a>。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472166923862840:1042163-video:1042163%3A4472169715925015:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472166923862840:2286908003" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hVUGyq" alt="http://t.cn/A6hVUGyq" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> （央视） ​​​​<a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="uid=2286908003&amp;mid=4472166923862840&amp;pid=884f7263gy1gbwudtjvibj20gv0ejjvr" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_fstt&amp;value=pop_butt_home" imagecard="pid=884f7263gy1gbwudtjvibj20gv0ejjvr"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472165690535325" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iuhmh2fgh?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-15 09:40" date="1581730852000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472165690535325:fromprofile"> 2月15日 09:40</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【王贺胜：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%239%E4%B8%AA%E6%96%B9%E8%88%B1%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E6%94%B6%E6%B2%BB%E6%82%A3%E8%80%855606%E5%90%8D%23&amp;from=default">#9个方舱医院收治患者5606名#</a>】湖北省委常委王贺胜介绍：目前已开放9个方舱医院，有6960多张床位，在院的患者达到了5606名。下一步将继续腾空医院部分病房，征用部分场馆，改造为定点医院和方舱医院，确保已排查确诊的患者和疑似患者都能够得到集中的收治，要<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A1%AE%E4%BF%9D%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E6%9C%AA%E6%94%B6%E6%B2%BB%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E4%BA%BA%E6%95%B0%E6%B8%85%E9%9B%B6%23&amp;from=default">#确保所有未收治患者人数清零#</a>。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iuhmh2fgh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472165690535325:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472165690535325&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E8%B0%83%E5%8A%A8%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E8%A7%84%E6%A8%A1%E9%80%9F%E5%BA%A6%E8%B6%85%E6%B1%B6%E5%B7%9D%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%E6%95%91%E6%8F%B4%23&amp;from=default">#抗疫调动医疗规模速度超汶川地震救援#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%84%E5%9C%B0%E5%85%B1%E6%B4%BE%E5%87%BA25633%E5%90%8D%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E5%91%98%E9%A9%B0%E6%8F%B4%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%23&amp;from=default">#各地共派出25633名医疗队员驰援湖北#</a>】截至2月14日24时，各地共派出了217支医疗队，25633名医疗队员，不包括军队派出的医疗队和队员。此外，还调集了三个移动的P3实验室，其中在武汉市有181支医疗队，20374名医疗队员，在其他城市有36支医疗队，5259名医疗队员 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iuhf8nu9B" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472161265597459:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472161265597459&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【直播：国新办疫情联防联控机新闻发布会】国务院新闻办公室于2月15日9时在湖北武汉举行新闻发布会，请国家卫生健康委党组成员、副主任，湖北省委常委王贺胜等介绍在湖北组织开展疫情防控和医疗救治工作情况，并答记者问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472155783437069:1034-video:1034%3A4474287092858887:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472155783437069:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hVPpEi" alt="http://t.cn/A6hVPpEi" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BA%B7%E5%A4%8D%E5%8C%BB%E5%8A%A1%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E6%8D%90%E8%A1%80%E6%B5%86%E6%95%91%E6%B2%BB%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#康复医务人员捐血浆救治重症患者#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】13日，金银潭医院院长张定宇恳请新冠肺炎康复者捐献血浆。14日，武汉3个康复者血浆捐献点成功采集数位康复者血浆。首批献血者，是江夏区中医院19名新冠肺炎治愈医务人员。经隔离观察期后，他们从5日开始，累计捐献6600毫升血浆。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>（长江日报 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iuh2Fot40" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472153535831596:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472153535831596&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E6%9D%91%E6%B0%91%E7%BB%99%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%8D%903%E5%90%A8%E6%8A%98%E8%80%B3%E6%A0%B9%23&amp;from=default">#四川村民给武汉捐3吨折耳根#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> 四川什邡，村民为武汉捐赠了60吨蔬菜，有花菜、莴笋、萝卜等，他们用电三轮、拖板车一车一车地将蔬菜送到集中点。这其中就有3吨是折耳根。目前，这些蔬菜已发往武汉。网友：不知道湖北人吃的习惯吗？<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/2d/2018new_xiaoerbuyu_org.png" title="[笑而不语]" alt="[笑而不语]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%A2%A8%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=梨视频">@梨视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472151182949528:2017607-video:2017607%3A4471952237068313:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472151182949528:2286908003" title="一手video的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6htijMj" alt="http://t.cn/A6htijMj" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>一手video的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2286908003&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4472151182949528"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>931</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

        </div>
    </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609330614&amp;ssig=iy%2FkLrfqP1" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472144483899867" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IugO4gmx5?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-15 08:16" date="1581725795000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472144483899867:fromprofile"> 2月15日 08:16</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【11连降！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B11%E8%BF%9E%E9%99%8D%23&amp;from=default">#湖北以外新增病例11连降#</a>】据国家卫健委数据统计，2月14日0-24时，全国除湖北以外地区新增确诊病例221例，连续第11日呈下降态势。过去这一数据分别为：3日890例、4日731例、5日707例、696例、7558例、8日509例、9日444例、10日381例、11日377例、12日312例、13日267例。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <!-- 二级评论 -->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472139115276396" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IugFpm8Da?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-15 07:55" date="1581724516000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472139115276396:fromprofile"> 2月15日 07:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【钟南山院士指导研发<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%9F%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%E8%AF%95%E5%89%82%E7%9B%92%23&amp;from=default">#快速检测试剂盒#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%87%E4%B8%80%E6%BB%B4%E8%A1%8015%E5%88%86%E9%92%9F%E5%86%85%E5%8F%AF%E8%8E%B7%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%E7%BB%93%E6%9E%9C%23&amp;from=default">#采一滴血15分钟内可获检测结果#</a>】昨天，呼吸疾病国家重点实验室对外透露，近日，在钟南山院士的指导下，实验室联合多家研究机构，最新研发出新型冠状病毒IgM抗体快速检测试剂盒，并已在实验室和临床完成初步评价。据介绍，仅需采取一滴血就可在15分钟内肉眼观察 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IugFpm8Da" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472139115276396:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472139115276396&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IugDm25cw&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609330614&amp;ssig=iy%2FkLrfqP1" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472137840496652" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IugDm25cw?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-15 07:50" date="1581724212000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472137840496652:fromprofile"> 2月15日 07:50</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E4%B9%92%E6%8D%9060%E4%B8%87%E4%B8%AA%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%23&amp;from=default">#国乒捐60万个口罩#</a> 】据国际乒联<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/ITTFWorld?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=ITTFWorld">@ITTFWorld</a> 消息，在收到中国乒协寻求海外医护资源的邮件之后，国际乒联积极帮忙联系并给予协助。截止到14日，中国乒协已从海外购置了60万个医用外科口罩捐给武汉等一线疫区。目前正在完成相关的运输手续，希望尽快能将物资运抵抗疫一线。 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609330614&amp;ssig=iy%2FkLrfqP1" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472136884391895" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IugBOiqx1?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-15 07:46" date="1581723983000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472136884391895:fromprofile"> 2月15日 07:46</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        ​​【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%98%8E%E7%A1%AE%E5%B0%8F%E5%8C%BA%E5%B0%81%E9%97%AD%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E6%8E%AA%E6%96%BD%23&amp;from=default">#武汉明确小区封闭管理措施#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E5%B0%8F%E5%8C%BA%E5%8F%AA%E4%BF%9D%E7%95%99%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E5%87%BA%E5%85%A5%E5%8F%A3%23&amp;from=default">#一个小区只保留一个出入口#</a>】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=武汉发布">@武汉发布</a> ，2月14日，武汉市新冠肺炎疫情防控指挥部发布通知，明确住宅小区封闭管理主要措施，要求对住宅小区实行封闭管理时，一个小区一律只保留一个出入口。老旧小区、开放式居住区通过打围方式实现硬隔离。出入口安排人员24小时 ​​​​...<a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="uid=2286908003&amp;mid=4472136884391895&amp;pid=884f7263gy1gbwq88kcesj20ck0ckgmb" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_fstt&amp;value=pop_butt_home" imagecard="pid=884f7263gy1gbwq88kcesj20ck0ckgmb"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a><a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IugBOiqx1" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472136884391895:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472136884391895&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">

    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【《我们不怕》！致敬<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%AD%E7%9A%84%E9%80%86%E8%A1%8C%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#疫情中的逆行者#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】“你的手托起了生命，你用爱，心和心就是一座城。”面对疫情，他们选择成为逆行者，防疫一线，他们义无反顾...超燃公益歌曲《我们不怕》↓↓致敬疫情中的逆行者！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，愿逆行者都平安归来！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472132874324912:1034-video:1034%3A4472018494488611:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472132874324912:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hc1Qf3" alt="http://t.cn/A6hc1Qf3" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472128998777069" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iugp5APjD?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-15 07:15" date="1581722104000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472128998777069:fromprofile"> 2月15日 07:15</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【协助中国抗击新冠肺炎<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E4%B8%93%E5%AE%B6%E7%BB%84%E5%B0%86%E4%BA%8E%E6%9C%AC%E5%91%A8%E6%9C%AB%E6%8A%B5%E8%BE%BE%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#国际专家组将于本周末抵达中国#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>世界卫生组织总干事谭德塞14日宣布，协助中国抗击新冠肺炎的国际专家组所有成员将于本周末抵达中国。（新华社） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4472019850205588" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iudz30RtW?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-15 00:01" date="1581696081000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472019850205588:fromprofile"> 2月15日 00:01</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E6%B4%AA%E6%B9%9614%E6%97%A5%E8%B5%B7%E5%AE%9E%E6%96%BD%E6%88%98%E6%97%B6%E5%B0%81%E9%97%AD%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%23&amp;from=default">#湖北洪湖14日起实施战时封闭管理#</a>】为应对当前疫情发展严峻形势，控制人员流动和车辆通行，彻底阻断疫情传播，根据《传染病防治法》、《治安管理处罚法》和《突发公共卫生事件应急条例》等相关法律法规，洪湖市疫情防控指挥部决定，自2020年2月14日24:00起在全市范围全面升级管控措施，原则上以14天 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iudz30RtW" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472019850205588:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472019850205588&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472015018456402" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IudrfztTA?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-14 23:42" date="1581694929000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472015018456402:fromprofile"> 2月14日 23:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E5%AE%B6%E7%95%8C%E7%96%BE%E6%8E%A7%E4%B8%AD%E5%BF%83%E7%A7%91%E9%95%BF%E5%88%B0%E5%9B%BD%E5%A4%96%E8%BA%B2%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E8%A2%AB%E6%92%A4%E8%81%8C%23&amp;from=default">#张家界疾控中心科长到国外躲疫情被撤职#</a>调查】14日，湖南省纪委通报5起违反新冠肺炎疫情防控纪律典型问题，其中有张家界市疾控中心慢性非传染性疾病防治科科长李文杰擅离职守、临阵脱逃，携家人到泰国躲避疫情问题。2020年1月21日，李文杰被抽调到张家界市新冠肺炎疫情防控指挥部，负责疫情信息报送 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IudrfztTA" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472015018456402:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472015018456402&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <div comment_id="4472012443803473" node-type="root_comment" class="list_li S_line1 clearfix">

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8A%A0%E6%B2%B9%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#加油武汉#</a>【“人民战‘疫’”公益海报|我们能赢<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/02/hot_wuhanjiayou_org.png" title="[武汉加油]" alt="[武汉加油]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】同时间赛跑，与病魔较量，中国人民正全力以赴。各企业也第一时间纷纷加入驰援疫情防控队伍当中，展现出企业的社会责任与正气。人民网公益频道用“人民战‘疫’”公益海报记录这场全民防疫阻击战中的暖心时刻，为打赢这场人民守卫战加油助力 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IudhjwkXf" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472008857707049:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472008857707049&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472007372392602" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IudeVa2qm?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-14 23:11" date="1581693106000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472007372392602:fromprofile"> 2月14日 23:11</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【“你在家里好好写作业，爸爸上班去了”】连续坚守一线二十多天的民警抽空“回”到家，仅仅只是隔着铁门接过妻子给他准备的换洗衣物和食物。“你在家里好好写作业”，简单地叮嘱儿子后，民警又准备奔赴一线。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，感谢这些幕后英雄的坚守！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%B9%96%E5%8D%97%E9%AB%98%E9%80%9F%E8%AD%A6%E5%AF%9F?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=湖南高速警察">@湖南高速警察</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4472007372392602:1034-video:1034%3A4471952052781074:page_100206_home:2286908003:4472007372392602:2286908003" title="湖南高速警察的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ht6PJr" alt="http://t.cn/A6ht6PJr" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>湖南高速警察的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">

        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <div comment_id="4472008991471827" node-type="root_comment" class="list_li S_line1 clearfix">

                                                                                                                        【看到泪目！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%87%8C%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%8E%E5%A6%BB%E4%B9%A6%23&amp;from=default">#疫情里的与妻书#</a>：“责之所在，道义在肩，我无怨。” <img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6e/2018new_leimu_org.png" title="[泪]" alt="[泪]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%97%A0%E5%8F%8D%E9%A1%BE%E7%9A%84%E7%88%B1%23&amp;from=default">#疫无反顾的爱#</a>上海儿童医学中心隔离诊区陈轶维医生的太太，一位人民教师，给先生写了一封信，这是她和先生认识至今写的第一份家书。13日深夜，陈医生在医院里予以回信，写下了《致我亲爱的太太》，令人动容。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;吾妻漪雯 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iuda70MHp" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472004390187203:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472004390187203&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=1547311023&amp;cid=4472004700797912&amp;nick=一枚有态度de青年&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4472001579912428" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iud5zFAFS?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-14 22:48" date="1581691725000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4472001579912428:fromprofile"> 2月14日 22:48</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【北京：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%94%E4%BA%AC%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%88%B0%E4%BA%AC%E5%90%8E%E5%9D%87%E5%BA%94%E5%B1%85%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%96%E9%9B%86%E4%B8%AD%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F14%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#返京人员到京后均应居家或集中观察14天#</a>】14日晚，北京新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作领导小组办公室发布通告，从即日起，所有返京人员到京后，均应居家或集中观察14天。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9E%E4%BA%AC%E9%A1%BB%E6%8F%90%E5%89%8D%E5%90%91%E5%8D%95%E4%BD%8D%E5%8F%8A%E5%B1%85%E4%BD%8F%E7%A4%BE%E5%8C%BA%E6%8A%A5%E5%91%8A%23&amp;from=default">#回京须提前向单位及居住社区报告#</a>。拒绝接受居家观察、集中观察等防控措施的，依法追究责任。（北京日报客户端） ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iud5zFAFS" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4472001579912428:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4472001579912428&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        </li>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2286908003&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4472001579912428"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>195</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4472001579912428&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">

                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E6%97%A5%E8%AE%B0%23&amp;from=default">#隔离日记#</a>【世界冠军教你做台阶练习】只要有运动之心，方寸之地也可以是运动场！蹦床世界冠军<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/--%E5%BC%B5%E9%98%94?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=--張阔">@--張阔</a> 带领我们做台阶练习，一起强身健体、提高免疫力！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%A6%E5%81%A5%E8%BA%AB%E6%AF%8F%E4%B8%80%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#科学健身每一天#</a>，快跟着教程，动起来↓↓提醒：视频中运动负荷较大，锻炼前注意充分热身哦～<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E4%BD%93%E8%82%B2?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民体育">@人民体育</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471999714094822:1034-video:1034%3A4471901352034324:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471999714094822:2286908003" title="人民体育的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6h5d9gS" alt="http://t.cn/A6h5d9gS" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民体育的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

    <div class="WB_feed_handle" node-type="feed_list_options">
        <div class="WB_handle">

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%895%E5%90%8D%E5%B9%B2%E9%83%A8%E8%BD%AC%E8%BF%90%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E4%B8%8D%E5%8A%9B%E8%A2%AB%E9%97%AE%E8%B4%A3%23&amp;from=default">#武汉5名干部转运患者组织不力被问责#</a>】2月9日下午，武汉市疫情防控指挥部要求武昌区于当晚12时前向定点医院转运494名患者。当晚在患者转运过程中，武昌区水果湖街、黄鹤楼街、珞珈山街等工作滞后、衔接无序、组织混乱，跟车服务不到位，导致重症病人长时间等待继而情绪失控，造成恶劣影响。武汉市纪 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IucYVaGiS" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471997452545898:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471997452545898&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2812623367" usercard="id=2812623367">北岛哥哥</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//verified.weibo.com/verify"><i title="微博个人认证 " class="W_icon icon_approve_gold"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a>：早就该换帅了，湖北一些官僚已经没有公信力了，他们所说的每一句话，百姓都在质疑；百姓质疑的每一件事，他们都在否认；他们否认的每一件事，最后都被证实；最后证实的每一件事，都是不了了之。希望所有人都保护好自己，劝告家人减少外出，希望终将会到来！        </div>
                <!-- 评论图片的处理 -->
                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="comment_media_disp"></div>

        <!-- 对评论的操作 -->

                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IucR5qtfr&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609330621&amp;ssig=IbSdTksDju" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471992596308961" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IucR5qtfr?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-14 22:13" date="1581689583000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471992596308961:fromprofile"> 2月14日 22:13</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【中国中医科学院院长：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%8C%BB%E8%8D%AF%E5%BA%94%E6%B7%B1%E5%BA%A6%E4%BB%8B%E5%85%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%B2%BB%E7%96%97%23&amp;from=default">#中医药应深度介入新冠肺炎治疗#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E7%9C%81%E4%B8%AD%E5%8C%BB%E8%8D%AF%E5%8F%82%E4%B8%8E%E6%95%91%E6%B2%BB%E7%8E%87%E8%BE%BE75%25%23&amp;from=default">#湖北省中医药参与救治率达75%#</a>】国家中医药管理局医疗救治专家组组长、中国中医科学院院长黄璐琦表示：中医药应从两方面深度介入治疗。①要扩大中医药救治面。湖北省中医药参与救治率达75%，而全国其他地区达90%以上，所以湖北省还有很大的空 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IucR5qtfr" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471992596308961:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471992596308961&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BE%BD%E5%AE%81%E7%AC%AC%E4%BA%8C%E6%89%B9233%E4%BA%BA%E5%AF%B9%E5%8F%A3%E6%94%AF%E6%8F%B4%E8%A5%84%E9%98%B3%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%23&amp;from=default">#辽宁第二批233人对口支援襄阳医疗队#</a>已抵达 连夜投入工作】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>继2月12日辽宁省对口支援襄阳第一批医疗队83名队员奔赴襄阳后，辽宁省对口支援襄阳第二批医疗队233名白衣战士乘坐南航两架包机分别于今晚19：40、19：50到达襄阳。医疗队成员今晚就将前往各个援助县市区的医院。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IucN1nkJO" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471990075561264:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471990075561264&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月14日 22:09</div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471983980414499" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IucDc1JPt?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-14 21:38" date="1581687529000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471983980414499:fromprofile"> 2月14日 21:38</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【中医药专家回应方舱医院内打太极拳：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%AA%E6%9E%81%E6%8B%B3%E5%85%AB%E6%AE%B5%E9%94%A6%E5%AF%B9%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E6%9C%89%E7%9B%8A%23&amp;from=default">#太极拳八段锦对患者有益#</a>】国家中医药管理局医疗救治专家组副组长、广东省中医院副院长、第二支国家中医医疗队队长张忠德表示，患者在隔离病区常常表现出焦虑、失眠、腹胀，通过中医药治疗之后得到明显缓解，八段锦太极拳明显增强患者体质、加快康复，对患者是有 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IucDc1JPt" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471983980414499:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471983980414499&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                                                  </div>  
            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>   
</div></div>
    </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471983552804384" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IucCvbLy0?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-14 21:37" date="1581687427000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471983552804384:fromprofile"> 2月14日 21:37</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【广东省中医院副院长：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%8C%BB%E8%8D%AF%E8%83%BD%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%9F%E6%94%B9%E5%96%84%E8%BD%BB%E7%97%87%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%23&amp;from=default">#中医药能快速改善轻症患者症状#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%8C%BB%E8%8D%AF%E8%83%BD%E5%87%8F%E5%B0%91%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E5%90%91%E5%8D%B1%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E8%BD%AC%E5%8C%96%23&amp;from=default">#中医药能减少重症向危重症转化#</a>】国家中医药管理局医疗救治专家组副组长、广东省中医院副院长、第二支国家中医医疗队队长张忠德表示，中医药治疗轻症方面表现在能快速改善患者症状，在病人退烧、减少咳嗽，咽喉痛、极度食欲不振、乏力改善比较 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IucCvbLy0" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471983552804384:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471983552804384&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
