                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=Iucx2f8C4&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609330621&amp;ssig=IbSdTksDju" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471980163608032" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iucx2f8C4?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-14 21:23" date="1581686619000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471980163608032:fromprofile"> 2月14日 21:23</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【仝小林：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%A7%E5%8A%9B%E5%AE%A3%E4%BC%A0%E4%B8%AD%E5%8C%BB%E6%B2%BB%E6%9C%AA%E7%97%85%E6%80%9D%E6%83%B3%23&amp;from=default">#大力宣传中医治未病思想#</a>】国家中医药管理局医疗救治专家组组长仝小林在发布会上介绍：预防新冠肺炎的发生，初期吃中药，是防止病症由轻转重；到了重症，要中西医结合，减少死亡；恢复期，通过益气健脾、益气养阴、化痰通络方法，以及火罐刮痧等非药物疗法帮助病人恢复。很多民众对中医治未 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iucx2f8C4" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471980163608032:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471980163608032&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

<!-- /VideoCard -->
                                                                                                                                            </div>
    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

                                                                                    <!-- feed区 大数据tag -->
                    </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="WB_feed_handle" node-type="feed_list_options">

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

            </li>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B0%BD%E5%BF%AB%E6%8E%A8%E5%8A%A8%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%B0%E7%94%9F%E7%89%A9%E5%AE%89%E5%85%A8%E6%B3%95%23&amp;from=default">#尽快推动出台生物安全法#</a>【习近平主持召开中央全面深化改革委员会第十二次会议强调 完善重大疫情防控体制机制 健全国家公共卫生应急管理体系】习近平强调，要从保护人民健康、保障国家安全、维护国家长治久安的高度，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8A%8A%E7%94%9F%E7%89%A9%E5%AE%89%E5%85%A8%E7%BA%B3%E5%85%A5%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E5%AE%89%E5%85%A8%E4%BD%93%E7%B3%BB%23&amp;from=default">#把生物安全纳入国家安全体系#</a>，系统规划国家生物安全风险防控和治理体系建设，全面 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Iuch96MsF" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471970311616257:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471970311616257&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4471965845107171" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Iuc9WlqBJ?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-14 20:26" date="1581683205000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471965845107171:fromprofile"> 2月14日 20:26</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">

                                                                【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%85%E8%92%99%E5%8F%A4%E6%94%AF%E6%8F%B4%E9%A6%96%E6%89%B9%E7%89%9B%E7%BE%8A%E8%82%89%E6%8A%B5%E8%BE%BE%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&from=default\">#内蒙古支援首批牛羊肉抵达武汉#<\/a>】14日晚，满载52.1吨牛羊肉的货机载着草原人民的浓浓情谊，从呼和浩特起飞抵达武汉。预计一周内，呼和浩特白塔机场继续保障任务，将350余吨牛羊肉运抵武汉。据此前报道，<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%85%E8%92%99%E5%8F%A4%E6%94%AF%E6%8F%B4%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%B9%B3%E8%82%89600%E5%90%A8%23&from=default\">#内蒙古支援湖北乳肉600吨#<\/a>，包括200吨羊肉、100吨牛肉、100吨猪肉和200吨牛奶。（湖北日报） href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%85%E8%92%99%E5%8F%A4%E6%94%AF%E6%8F%B4%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%B9%B3%E8%82%89%E5%88%B6%E5%93%81600%E5%90%A8%23&from=default\">#内蒙古支援湖北乳肉制品600吨#<\/a>今日启运】<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&from=default\">#万众一心抗击疫情#<\/a>11日下午，一件件牛奶在呼和浩特市集装上车。内蒙古支援湖北省乳制品和肉制品等生活必需品今日启运。此次支援的物资包括：200吨羊肉、100吨牛肉、100吨猪肉和200吨牛奶。内蒙古自治区商务厅厅长田永告诉记者，这批物资由内蒙古自治区分别                                                                                  【国家发改委：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%2380%E4%B8%87%E5%8F%AA%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%A8N95%E7%BA%A7%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E8%BF%90%E6%8A%B5%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%23&from=default\">#80万只医用N95级口罩运抵湖北#<\/a>】2月2日至13日18时，国家发展改革委共协调运抵湖北80万只医用N95级口罩，物流时间平均缩短21%，部分物资缩短50%以上。<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&from=default\">#万众一心抗击疫情#<\/a>（国家发展改革委）<a  title=\"国家发展改革委积极协调医用N95级口罩及时运...\" href=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6htdbBj\" alt=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6htdbBj\" action-type=\"feed_list_url\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><i class=\"W_ficon ficon_cd_link\">O<\/i>国家发展改革委积极协调医用N95级口罩及时运...<\/a> ​​​​                                            <\/div>\n                                                                <div class=\"WB_expand_media_box \" style=\"display: none;\" node-type=\"feed_list_media_disp\"><\/div>\n                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 \/>】沈阳小区封闭，快递小哥：谁有快递，我搁这捏啊！我在外你在里，我拿小棍呢递给你。你再往前走两步，病毒瞅你都发怵！深居简出戴口罩，在家听话别胡闹！特殊期间互理解，花开疫散，咱们再拥抱！（人民日报）&nbsp;&nbsp;<a                                               【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%AE%E8%A1%8C%E5%90%91%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E8%B0%83%E6%8B%A8%E6%96%B0%E9%92%9E40%E4%BA%BF%E5%85%83%23&from=default\">#央行向武汉调拨新钞40亿元#<\/a>】<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&from=default\">#万众一心抗击疫情#<\/a> 央行副行长范一飞介绍，央行采取多项措施切实保障现金使用安全：①人民银行积极向武汉调拨新钞40亿元，加大对医院等疫情防控关键单位的现金供应；②尽可能对外投放回笼发行基金；③做好流通中现金的消毒；④<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E9%93%B6%E8%A1%8C%E6%94%B6%E5%88%B0%E7%8E%B0%E9%87%91%E5%BF%85%E9%A1%BB%E6%B6%88%E6%AF%92%E6%89%8D%E8%83%BD%E6%8A%95%E6%94%BE%E5%AE%A2%E6%88%B7%23&from=default\">#银行收到现金必须消毒才能投放客户#<\/a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2286908003\/IuhFJxjk8\" class=\"WB_text_opt\" suda-uatrack=\"key=original_blog_unfold&value=click_unfold:4472177757939108:2286908003\" action-type=\"fl_unfold\"                                                                                  【正在直播：国务院联防联控机制新闻发布会】国务院联防联控机制于15日上午10时举行新闻发布会，请中国人民银行、中国银行保险监督管理委员会、中国证券监督管理委员会、国家外汇管理局负责人介绍金融系统全力支持抗击疫情和恢复生产有关情况，敬请关注。<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\"                                                                                  【王贺胜：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\"
